name: ACRTask
description: Build and run container images using Azure Container Registry (ACR) tasks
author: Microsoft Corporation
helpMarkDown: [Learn more about this task](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=851275) or [see the ACR Task documentation](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/container-registry/container-registry-tasks-overview)

inputs.name: connectedServiceName
inputs.label: Azure subscription
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure resource manager subscription for the deployment

inputs.name: azureContainerRegistry
inputs.label: Azure Container Registry
inputs.helpMarkDown: Select an Azure Container Registry which will be used for pulling container images and deploying applications to the Kubernetes cluster. Required for commands that need to authenticate with a registry.

inputs.name: contextType
inputs.label: Source context type
inputs.helpMarkDown: Method by which the source context should be provided to the ACR task.

inputs.name: contextPath
inputs.label: Source context path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path to the content to be sent as the context for the ACR task. For release having multiple artifacts provide with artifact alias name in the path too. For example, $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)/_alias1

inputs.name: repositoryName
inputs.label: Repository
inputs.helpMarkDown: Enter repository full name i.e. 'organization/repository' to be used as the source context

inputs.name: branch
inputs.label: Branch
inputs.helpMarkDown: Branch to be used as source context.

inputs.name: dockerfileOrTaskFile
inputs.label: Dockerfile or task file path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path to the Dockerfile or the ACR task template file path relative to the source context

inputs.name: tags
inputs.label: Tags
inputs.helpMarkDown:
A list of tags in separate lines. These tags are used in build, push and buildAndPush commands. Ex:

beta1.1
latest

inputs.name: arguments
inputs.label: Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: The collection of build arguments to be used when executing a docker build. Format: --build-arg arg1=value1 --build-arg arg2=val2

inputs.name: valuesFilePath
inputs.label: ValuesFilePath
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ACR task values file path relative to the source context. Values.yaml contains "key:value" pairs that replace the keys in the acr task template file.

inputs.name: os
inputs.label: Operating system
inputs.helpMarkDown: operating system for the acr task

inputs.name: cwd
inputs.label: Working Directory
inputs.helpMarkDown: Current working directory where the script(not ACR) is run.  Empty is the root of the repo (build) or artifacts (release), which is $(System.DefaultWorkingDirectory)

inputs.name: pat
inputs.label: PAT for updating the baseimage trigger
inputs.helpMarkDown: This PAT would be passed down to the baseImageTrigger field to trigger this pipeline whenever the base image is updated
